Posts.Content: Dec 20, 2009 05:32PM jmo wrote: After suffering almost two weeks with the Kenalog, the doctor did give my Mother silvadene and she could notice the difference over night and in three days was able to continue on with her treatments. It just angers me because I am sure it was probably some kind of an insurance thing. She has three more treatments to go...done in time for Christmas. Thank you all for your suggestions....I appreciate it.
Posts.Title: Kenalog Cream jmo BarbaraJo50

Posts.Content: jmo wrote: Has anyone been prescribed Kenalog Cream for burns and blisters from radiation?  I haven't see anyone mention it. That is what my Mother was given but it doesn't seem to help and burns terribly when she applies it. Log in to post a reply
